about_the_game:
OVERVIEW:

Embark on an epic galactic conquest in Imperius, the ultimate 3D space RTS experience! Engage in explosive battles with stunning graphics, and master the intricacies of deep tactical combat mechanics!

COMBAT:

Plan your strategic odyssey with 24 units, each boasting its own special ability, and command epic hero units in riveting wave defense. Engage in single-player battles against dynamic AI opponents that adapt to your every move, providing an ever-evolving challenge. Experience the thrill as your fleet targets and demolishes specific parts of enemy ships, from turrets to engines.

MOVEMENT:

Command your fleet in a thrilling three-dimensional battlefield, aided by auto-pathfinding that makes asteroids and other obstacles seamless to navigate. Effortlessly arrange multiple ships into dynamic formations, and outmaneuver your opponents with advanced flanking tactics.

MULTIPLAYER:

Gear up for the ultimate showdown in Imperius' electrifying online multiplayer skirmish mode! Rally 2–4 players as they unleash armies and clash for survival in intense free-for-all battles or strategic team warfare. Seamlessly host or join matches with your Steam friends, and prepare for a showdown of galactic proportions!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Equivilant
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Imperius is an easy-to-learn, hard-to-master space RTS. Command devastating ships of the Imperius Navy and prove your loyalty by destroying everything in your path, no matter the cost.
